faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How many times can I generate documents for free?
faq.a1: You can generate unlimited versions but after 10, you must download once. After each download, the counter resets to 10.
faq.q2: What file formats do you provide?
faq.a2: All downloads include both PDF and DOCX formats.
faq.a3: No, your download credits never expire.
faq.a4: Since you can preview before purchase, refunds aren’t offered. Support is available for any issues.
